    • Uses of Maze in generation

      Classes in generation that implement Maze 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  MazeContainer
      Class encapsulates access to all information that constitutes a maze.

      a perfect (roomless) maze to subject to testing
      Methods in generation that return Maze 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Maze OrderStub.getMaze()
      Return the generated maze for testing.

      Sets things in order for a maze to be generated.
      Maze MazeFactoryTestEller.getMaze(boolean perfect, boolean deterministic, int level, boolean ignoreRooms) 
      Methods in generation with parameters of type Maze 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected boolean MazeFactoryTest._testAllCellsConnected(Maze maze)
      Verify that every cell has a path to the exit by verifying that for every cell c, there is at least one neighbor n of c that satisfies: |distance(c) - distance(n)|=1 c and n are not separated by a wallboard.
      protected boolean MazeFactoryTest._testExitAtExpectedLocationByBorders(Maze maze)
      Get the exit cell identified by MazeFactoryTest.getMazeExitsByBorders(Maze) and compare it with the cell returned by Maze.getMazedists().getExitPosition()
      protected boolean MazeFactoryTest._testExitAtExpectedLocationByDistance(Maze maze)
      Get the exit cell identified by MazeFactoryTest.getMazeExitsByDistance(Maze) and compare it with the cell returned by Maze.getMazedists().getExitPosition()
      void OrderStub.deliver(Maze mazeConfig)
      assigns the mazeConfig created by the factory to an internal field, which can be accessed for testing.
      void Order.deliver(Maze mazeConfig)
      Delivers the produced maze.
      protected java.util.ArrayList<int[]> MazeFactoryTest.getMazeExitsByBorders(Maze maze)
      Iterating over all cells in the maze, return a list that contains all cells with a missing border wall on the maze's external periphery.
      protected java.util.ArrayList<int[]> MazeFactoryTest.getMazeExitsByDistance(Maze maze)
      Iterating over all cells in the maze, return a list that contains all cells that have distance=1 from the exit.

      Methods in gui with parameters of type Maze 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void StateGenerating.deliver(Maze mazeConfig)
      The deliver method is the call back method for the background thread operated in the maze factory to deliver the ordered product, here the generated maze in its container, the MazeConfiguration object.
      void State.setMazeConfiguration(Maze config)
      Sets the maze to play, the maze configuration is a container that holds all necessary information about a particular maze that can be played.
